source.name: RSS Feeds for Observed Precipitation, River, and Alert Conditions
source.description: The  National Weather  Service (NWS)  Automated Flood Warning Systems uses  RSS feeds to disseminate for observed precipitation, river, and alert conditions.  These RSS feeds  are regularly updated and include the following:  observed precipitation values;  observed river stage values;  precipitation "alert" conditions based on local action settings; and river "alert" conditions based on local action settings.
